name: Amazon Fire TV Gaming Edition Streaming Media Player
categories: Amazon SMP,Electronics Features,Kids & Family,TV, Video & Home Audio,Frys,Digital Device 4,Consumer Electronics,Kids Family,Video Games,Internet & Media Streamers,Streaming Media Players,Fire TV,Home Audio,Consoles

reviews.reviews.text: Works excellent love it. Easy to use
The item seems to have a 'ton' of items to view - just wish it came with some directions on use. Otherwise product is great.
This has great possibilities for the ARMCHAIR POTATO by expanding what is available to view. I would recommend this to anyone.
